title: The Best of Eddy Howard: The Mercury Years (320)
description:
Eddy Howard - The Best of Eddy Howard: The Mercury Years - 320k

Eddy Howard was a popular jazz vocalist of the '40s and '50s, recording several major hits before rock & roll took over the airwaves in the mid fifties.  His music consists largely of mild romantic ballads and good-natured paeans that are easy on the ear.  He was still performing on the casino circuit until his death in 1963 at the youthful age of 48.

1.  To Each His Own 
2.  The Rickety Rickshaw Man 
3.  (I Love You) For Sentimental Reasons 
4.  The Girl That I Marry 
5.  My Adobe Hacienda 
6.  Heartaches 
7.  I Wonder, I Wonder, I Wonder 
8.  Ragtime Cowboy Joe 
9.  Kate (Have I Come to Early to Late)
10. Now Is the Hour 
11. On a Slow Boat to China 
12. Room Full of Roses 
13. Maybe It's Because 
14. To Think You've Chosen Me 
15. Sin (It's No Sin) 
16. Be Anything (But Be Mine) 
17. Auf Wiederseh'n Sweetheart 
18. A Penny a Kiss 
19. Mademoiselle 
20. Gomen Nasai (Forgive Me) 
21. Till We Two Are One 
22. Melancholy Me 
23. The Anniversary Waltz 
24. Happy Birthday 
25. Careless
